name: Get statistics for lists
description: Get comprehensive summary statistics for each list in your account including subscriber counts across active, unsubscribed, deleted and bounced as well as time-based data like new subscribers.

properties.helptext: The unique ID of the list you want the stats for. Go into the list in your account and click the 'change name/type' link below your list name. The 'API Subscriber List ID' is the ID you're looking for.
